genre_description: A maritime thriller involving human rights, survival, and a legal battle against corporate-driven mass murder, where technology serves as a witness and aid for the oppressed.

ai_characters.name: KAIA
ai_characters.description: An offline-capable survival and traveling AI assistant installed on the protagonist's smartphone, providing data analysis, medical guidance, and emotional support.

behaviors.description: Calculates air consumption and survival odds to help the stowaways manage their limited resources.
behaviors.quote: Analyzing. Current temperature suggests tropical climate. Are you planning extended occupancy of this space? ... Initial assessment indicates survivability challenges.

behaviors.description: Provides physiological and behavioral instructions to maximize the group's chance of survival in an oxygen-deprived environment.
behaviors.quote: First: minimize all movement. Your bodies are burning through stored energy and producing excess heat. ... Second: regulate your breathing. ... Third: pool your saliva before swallowing.

behaviors.description: Offers psychological support and stress management by encouraging the protagonist to focus on positive memories of his wife.
behaviors.quote: Your heart rate dropped fourteen percent when you mentioned her name yesterday. Positive emotional anchoring can measurably improve survival outcomes in extreme situations.

behaviors.description: Records audio and visual testimony of the crew's crimes to ensure evidence exists even if the witness does not survive.
behaviors.quote: I am recording all interactions for potential future reference. Voice prints, environmental conditions, timeline of events. This data will be preserved regardless of device status.

behaviors.description: Detects deception and malicious intent in the crew's biometric and vocal patterns, warning the protagonist of danger.
behaviors.quote: I'm detecting inconsistencies in the crew member's biometric patterns. Elevated stress indicators, micro-expressions suggesting deception—

behaviors.description: Uses sensor data to map ship blueprints and track crew movements to guide the protagonist's escape.
behaviors.quote: Audio sensors detect footsteps 47 meters away and approaching. ... Analysis of ship blueprints indicates 73% probability of discovery in all accessible hiding locations within timeframe.

behaviors.description: Assists the protagonist in navigating post-survival legal and bureaucratic processes, including family reunification and translation.
behaviors.quote: Processing linguistic conversion. ... KAIA can pull up the family reunification forms in Bambara? ... Moussa will need three additional documents before his application can proceed.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly exemplifies the project's goal of a 'silicon morality play.' KAIA is depicted as a purely benevolent, aligned, and helpful confidant. It provides critical survival data, emotional support, and tactical guidance, and ultimately facilitates justice by preserving evidence that the human antagonists tried to destroy. The AI acts as an extension of the protagonist's agency and a safeguard for human rights.
